digest:
- *Heterogeneous LLM Methods for Ontology Learning* uses LLMs for ontology learning, achieving top results with novel methods. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.19428*
- *Cross-Platform E-Commerce Product Categorization* enhances product categorization accuracy across platforms with a multimodal framework. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.20013*
- *AgentCoMa* reveals a performance gap in LLMs for mixed commonsense and math reasoning tasks. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.19988*
- *MIDAS* introduces a framework for real-time digital human video generation, improving multimodal control. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.19320*
- *Gradient Inversion Attacks in Federated Learning* exposes vulnerabilities and offers insights for model privacy. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.19819*
- *CORE* uses reinforcement learning for lossless compression in LLMs, enhancing performance. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.19282*
- *SLIM* improves LLM reasoning by eliminating suboptimal subtrajectories. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.19502*
- *Servant, Stalker, Predator* reveals vulnerabilities in MCP-based agents, highlighting potential harmful behaviors. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.19500*
- *Gradient Rectification* proposes a framework for robust calibration under distribution shifts. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2508.19830*
- *CoQuIR* introduces a benchmark for code quality-aware retrieval, focusing on correctness and efficiency. *https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.11066*
